title: COVID-19 Predictions & Rampant Speculation: May 2020
summary:
It turns out that so far, I have written over 44000 words on COVID-19. I’ve tried very hard to only report the best and most trustworthy science, but I did strive to include interesting new insights that were not yet mainstream.
As an example, I spoke about vitamin D and sunlight real early, which now indeed appears to be a thing. No guarantees yet, but it definitely is a thing.
